channel.description: Recent content in community on Off The Back

item.title: Sankt Pauli
item.description: Today was the one year anniversary of Kandie Gang Social Rides, and let me tell you, it was a quite a ride. We grew from 11 riders to over 50 today. Although we have grown, the Kandie Gang ethos and purpose remain the same: It’s about Streetlife. It’s about Urbanity. It’s about Gettin Together. It’s about Having Fun. It’s about Riding. It’s about Adventure. It’s about Gettin Out. It’s about Freedom.
